source.name: Use location.replace
source.instructions:
In the file `example.html` in the top left hand pane, you are asked to add two lines of code that will both use `location.replace`
1. On line 38 add a call to `window.location.replace` that will change our URL to the home URL which is : `example.html#section=home`
1. On line 48 add a call to `window.location.replace` that will change our URL to the currently clicked section, which is `"example.html#section="+section`

Try reloading the preview to see if it all works.
Good luck!

source.name: Fix the buttons
source.instructions:
You are asked to connect this `toggleClick` function to the buttons using their `onclick` property.  For that we have prepared on line 20 a `for` loop that iterates through these three buttons. 

You have to assign `toggleClick` to the `onclick` property of the current button: `buttons[i]` inside the for loop.

When this is done, our buttons should work correctly. Refresh the preview in the bottom left hand pane and try clicking the buttons.

Good luck.

source.name: Your first form
source.instructions:
In the top left hand pane you will find a file called `challenge.html` that we prepared for you.

You are asked to edit it and add to the `body` of the page :
1. A `<form>` with `action="https://codio-forms-unit.com"`.
    Inside that form:
        1. An `<input>` with `type="text"` and `name="firstname"`
        2. An `<input>` with `type="text"` and `name="lastname"`
        3. A `<button>` with `type="submit"` and some text.

When this is all done, you should try to refresh the preview, fill the text fields and submit the form to try it.

source.name: Let's fix it!
source.instructions:
On line 54 we have put a comment, `//your code here`:
Write code that will check if there is no visible section using the code above. If there is none, it will use the jQuery `show()` function on the div with ID `#error` that we added on line 18 for you.

Try it in the preview in the bottom left hand pane with a wrong section to see if it works.

Good luck!
